AppController Class Reference

Controller API. More...

#include <AppController.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for AppController:

Detailed Description

This provides access to all available hardware interfaces.

Here is a simple example of using the controller.

#include <fogo/AppController.hpp>
using namespace Api;
fogo_sys_t report;
Controller::init();
//load the current report
Controller::report(report);
//update the flashlight LED output to max
report.led = report.led_extrema[1];
//write the report to the device -- 100% LED output becomes effective
Controller::setreport(report);

Member Function Documentation

static int AppController::init ( const char *  app_name = 0,
bool  use_display = true 
)
static

This method must be called for any other access to the controller. It should only be called once for each process.

Returns
Zero on success
static int AppController::wait ( void  )
static

This method will wait for a system event to occur. The app will be suspended until an event happens.

The event type is recorded in the report.

Returns
Zero on successfully waiting for an event
